overview:
Michael is a problem solver and innovator, creating product and marketing strategy.

Michael is the COO at ElementsLocal, Inc., the creators of ElementsLocal, a software system for franchise companies, making it easy to maintain franchise brand consistency and provide local marketing with local websites. Michael Manages relationships with clients: Sport Clips, Inc., Paul Davis, Jiffy Lube, Maaco, Glass Doctor, Handyman Connection, Floor Coverings International, Weed Man, Certa Pro Painters & many others. Prior to ElementsLocal, Michael was the Vice President of Operations at Web Associates working with Quiksilver, Apple, HP, AMD, Blackberry (RIM), California Closets, Marvell Semiconductor, Linear Technologies and Yahoo. In past years, he’s held senior management positions at a Software, Financial Services and Consulting Businesses.

Michael lives in Arroyo Grande, California with his wife and son and he enjoys league basketball, league volleyball, skiing and the occasional scuba diving. Michael serves on the board of the Rotary Club of Pismo Beach, the Chamber of Commerce, and many other community non-profit organizations.
